extracted_playbook.title: Update Software and Security Configurations
extracted_playbook.description: Update VPNs, network infrastructure devices, and devices used for remote work with the latest software patches and security configurations.

extracted_playbook.title: Alert Employees to Phishing Attempts
extracted_playbook.description: Inform employees about the expected increase in phishing attempts and provide guidance on avoiding social engineering and phishing attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Prepare IT Security Personnel for Remote Access Tasks
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure IT security personnel are ready to enhance log review, attack detection, and incident response and recovery tasks as per NIST guidelines.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
extracted_playbook.description: Implement MFA on all VPN connections to enhance security. If MFA is not implemented, enforce the use of strong passwords.

extracted_playbook.title: Test VPN Limitations and Implement Modifications
extracted_playbook.description: Test VPN limitations to prepare for mass usage and implement modifications like rate limiting to prioritize users needing higher bandwidths.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Cybersecurity Incidents to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Contact CISA to report incidents, phishing, malware, and other cybersecurity concerns.
